about_the_game:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Sasuke Uchiha (Last Battle), you will acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

Content includes:
• 3 Ninjutsu
- Flying Thrust: Heavenly Hand Power (Defense Type)
- Susano'o Armor (Defense Type)
- Time Space (Substitution Jutsu)

• 1 Secret Technique
- Indra's Arrow (Defense Type)

• 2 Costumes
- Sasuke Outfit (Last Battle Ver.): Top and Bottom, for male/female avatars
- Sasuke Outfit (Young 2nd Ver.): Top and Bottom, for male/female avatars

• 2 Avatar Parts
- Hair: Indra, for male/female avatars
- Face: Cursemark Second State

• Additional Content
- Honorary Title: Bearer of Hatred

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
